meanings.definition: Happening, done, arriving, or existing before the proper time.
meanings.sent1: The prematures flowers bloomed early in the spring.
meanings.sent2: The prematures arrival of the package caught us by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The prematures party started before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent4: Her prematures decision to leave the meeting left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The prematures sunrise painted the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A baby born before the usual time of gestation.
meanings.sent1: The hospital had a special unit for prematures.
meanings.sent2: The prematures in the neonatal ward needed extra care.
meanings.sent3: The prematures in the nursery were tiny but strong.
meanings.sent4: The parents of the prematures were overjoyed at their progress.
meanings.sent5: The prematures in the incubators were closely monitored by the nurses.
